articles.description: Throughout the course of their lives, people typically encounter numerous other individuals with different interests, values and backgrounds. However, not all these individuals will become their good friends, life partners, or meaningful people in their lives.

articles.title: New Physics Model Challenges the Big Bang Story We Thought We Knew - SciTechDaily
